thread.section_title: HotelsOne Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HotelsOne | www.hotelsone.com
thread.title: Mr Clayton John Pascoe
thread.title_full: HotelsOne reviewed by Mr Clayton John Pascoe

author: Mr Clayton John Pascoe
title: Mr Clayton John Pascoe
text: Just wonderful. The service was very good, and the hotel room was exceptionally nice. If you are travelling to Brisbane on holidays or business, this Hotel is ideally located on Roma Street, (a major hub for the city's train network), or a 5 minute walk to the CBD.
